name: Social Media web app
highlights: A secure and user-friendly social media platform akin to Twitter. Deployed on Vercel with integrated CI/CD for efficient deployment and continuous improvement.
Technologies Used: Next.js,React with TailwindCSS was used for developing frontend and Express with Prisma for backend and mongodb database management.
Ensures secure login and registration processes utilizing JWT authentication service, empowering users to share their thoughts and media content
Enables users to connect, personalize their profiles, and customize them with unique cover images, fostering community engagement and individual expression.

name: Ecom React app
highlights: Developed the frontend of the project using JavaScript and React, with CSS for styling.
Utilized Redux and useContext for state management, ensuring efficient data handling and seamless updates throughout the application.
Implemented user authentication features including login and sign-up functionalities utilizing Firebase authentication service.
Implemented filtering functionality for products based on price and category.
Integrated features for adding and removing products from the shopping cart, Included payment integration for seamless checkout process

name: School Management System
highlights: The software provides a central dashboard for administrators to manage admissions, assign teachers, and organize subjects efficiently
User-Friendly Interface, tasks like creating timetables, tracking exam results, and generating attendance reports are simplified
The software facilitates smooth management of student fees, allowing administrators to track payments
The software features search and filter options to allow users to quickly find and sort through data based on their specific needs and requirements

name: Todo Application
highlights: Developed a MERN stack Todo App to facilitate efficient task and to-do list management.
Implemented user authentication features, including login and sign-up functionalities, utilizing JWT authentication service for enhanced security.
Implemented features using Express.js for handling server-side logic and routing for adding, editing,deleting and ensuring efficient task management.
Utilized the power of MongoDB, Express.js, React, and Node.js to craft a comprehensive application featuring a resilient backend API and a dynamic, user-friendly frontend interface.

name: School Erp Application
highlights: Built an ERP system for schools to manage student data, academic records, and administrative tasks.
Enabled efficient tracking and management of student data, ensuring comprehensive student profiles and academic records.
Streamlined administrative tasks such as admissions, class assignments,timetable, exams results and fee management.
Developed responsive frontend using React ,Tailwind CSS and JavaScript and Utilized Firebase for backend operations and real-time updates

name: ADVENTURE Time
highlights: Utilizes CSS for dynamic element adjustments, creating visual depth as users scroll.
Implements Advance CSS to seamlessly transition background images based on user scrolling
Ensures optimal performance across devices with CSS media queries for fluid layout adaptation
